pages.text: The Ritual of Floral Supremacy supercharges nearby Botania mana-generating flowers, doubling their production rate as if they were planted on enchanted soil. Requires $(thing)Botania$() to function.

pages.title: Costs
pages.text: $(bold)Activation:$() 10,000 LP$(br)$(bold)Upkeep:$() 50 LP per flower (configurable)$(br)$(bold)Range:$() 8 blocks (configurable)$(br)$(bold)Interval:$() Every second

pages.title: Effects
pages.text: $(bold)Generating Flowers:$() All mana-generating flowers in range tick twice per second, effectively doubling their output.$(br2)$(bold)Mana Spreaders:$() Spreaders in range are accelerated to 2x speed using temporal dominance.$(br2)$(italic)Nature's bloom feeds on sacrifice.$()
